attributes.action: Re-introduce wolves to the scottish highlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wolves are a part of natural european heritage. it would help regulate the excessive number of deer in the highlands, allowing plants to recover."Conservation is not for Third World countries alone- We cannot tell poor countries to conserve their large predators if we cannot do so ourselves. Wolves in Britain and Europe are what tigers are to India and what wild dogs are to southern Africa." it would generate tourism and boost the economy.Wolves do not generally kill people,and can live close to them. Wolves kill fewer livestock than presupposed.
